bibl.title: A Greek - Coptic Glossary Found at TT 65. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Found in 2005 in direct vicinity of Theban Tomb 65, by the Hungarian excavations led by Tamás A. Bács. - Greek-Coptic glossary, arranged by topics, one being catachesis, the other baptism.

bibl.title: From Illahun to Djeme. Papers Presented in Honour of Ulrich Luft.

bibl.seg: 142.13 / 142.4 O. Sheikh Abd el-Gurna Inv. 07/ID/06 (TT-NN-24-Forecourt, Reg. No. 435a)
Hasznos Andrea, A Greek - Coptic Glossary Found at TT 65. Avec résumé en anglais.
Eszter Bechtold, András Gulyás and Andrea Hasznos (Edd.), From Illahun to Djeme. Papers Presented in Honour of Ulrich Luft = BAR International Series. 2311 (Oxford, 2011) pp. 81-85, 2 figg.
Found in 2005 in direct vicinity of Theban Tomb 65, by the Hungarian excavations led by Tamás A. Bács. - Greek-Coptic glossary, arranged by topics, one being catachesis, the other baptism.
